normalised: Hey, did you guys know you can actually take a ferry from Mumbai to Goa now? It's supposed to take around fourteen hours, which is definitely longer than a flight but way more scenic, right? I saw an ad online, looks like tickets start from rupee four thousand, but that was probably for the basic class. Thinking of trying it out sometime in December, maybe around the twenty fifth, for a chill Christmas getaway. Has anyone here tried it yet? Let me know what you think!
